name: Tail Concerto Battle
storyline: Some time after the Iron Giant incident... The people of Prairie were gradually regaining their normal lives. And the royal city of Prairie held a kingdom festival to fulfill that rebirth. The kingdom festival was held...
summary: Tail Concerto Battle is a fan-made fighting game based on CyberConnect2's Tail Concerto, made in the 2D Fighting Maker 2nd. engine. The game features prominent characters from Tail Concerto, alongside guest characters Klonoa and Ran-oh.
